short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create alerts to get notified when insiders invest their own money in company stock

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Insidescoop lets you create alerts, so you get to know about the insider buys worth knowing about. We get our information directly from the SEC to notify you in real-time. 

Insidescoop alerts let you set the following criteria: 

ðŸ””Stock Ticker
ðŸ””Sector: e.g Energy, Finance, Technology etc.
ðŸ””Company Market Cap
ðŸ””Insider Role: e.g CEO, CFO, executives, 10% Owner
ðŸ””Buy Amount: min/max dollar value of the trade
ðŸ””Ownership Change %:  min/max percentage by which insider's equity increases after they make this trade

Notifications are available right within your toolbar as well as via email and/or Chrome browser notifications which can be toggled on/off.
